p: (3β,5α,8α)-Epidioxy-24-methylenecholest-6-en-3-ol ( 21) has been isolated from the several marine invertebrates, tunicate Ascidia nigra, pillar coral Dendrogyra cylindrus, marine sponge Thalysias juniperina, and sea hare Aplysia dactylomela [ 85]; in addition, this steroid was found in the tunicates Dendrodoa grossularia and Ascidiella aspersa, the gastropoda Aplysia depilans and Aplysia punctata [ 86], the sea anenome Metridium senile [ 87], and the sponge Tethya aurantia [ 88].
